name: Classic Breakfast
description: A hearty breakfast platter with eggs, bacon, toast, and fresh fruit.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Grilled chicken served on a bed of fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.

name: Juicy Mango Smoothie
description: A refreshing mango smoothie made with fresh mangoes and a hint of lime.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with garlic mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
